about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of your ancestors and embrace the challenges of medieval England in this captivating demo of "Under The Yoke." Craft your character and navigate through 250 years of rich, immersive Medieval history, beginning with the first generation of your family.

Embark on a journey as a humble serf, armed with just an acre of land, a ramshackle cottage, and the will to prosper. Guide your family through the Middle Ages, overseeing their lives from one generation to the next. Each character possesses distinct personalities, needs, and skills that shape their destinies.

Immerse yourself in the lives of your characters, each defined by Mind, Body, and Spirit traits. Choose wisely as you manage their daily toil, relationships, and essential needs. Satisfy their Taste with over authentic medieval ingredients, grant them Rest, nurture their Faith, and build lasting Social connections through genuine medieval experiences.

Survival in the Middle Ages demands mastering diverse trades. From Farming and Herbalism to Cooking, Husbandry, Carpentry, and Tailoring, engage in the myriad tasks of a medieval peasant's life. Adapt to changing seasons and market values to thrive.

While you focus on your family, the village thrives around you. Forge friendships, pursue romance, and navigate the political landscape as rival families vie for power. Enhance your cottage and garden, negotiate with your Lord for better living conditions, and witness the village's dynamic evolution.

Revive the Hallmote tradition, addressing legal disputes and participating in elections. Dive into the realm of politics, with rewards for winning elections and voting for allies. Negotiate your feudal dues with your Lord, rise from serfdom to freeman, and rewrite your own history.

Immerse yourself in medieval England's vibrant tapestry through a dynamic event system, featuring hundreds of unique events. Respond to pivotal moments in history from 1085 to 1335, shaping your family's legacy and experiencing the evolution of the world around you.

Experience the first generation of characters in the demo of Under The Yoke and then continue your story in the full game.
